description:
In the heart of the abyss stands a monolith-like structure, representing a scale, a balance between both worlds with its "weights" extending on both sides.   
   
The left side, a vibrant depiction of nature unfolds, captivating the essence of real-life experiences and fundamental rights, evoking a connection to our physical world.   
   
The right side of the scale however, takes on a digital persona. This realm represents the realm of Digital Rights, where the virtual realm intertwines with our daily lives.   
   
We witness the delicate balance between real-world and digital rights, where one cannot exist without the other, emphasizing the imperative to value each sphere equally. A profound reminder that compromising either realm would undermine the harmonious coexistence of these vital aspects of our lives.   
   
TLDR; SEIZE THE RIGHTS OF DIGITALIZATION   
   
Meme: 11   
Season: 4   
Card: 1
